reviews.text: The staff are so friendly, if you ask them a question they are more than helpful!! It makes a difference especially if you dont know where you are going they make sure you know what platform and when the next train is. Thank you to the staff at Amersham underground station.

Very nice station on the Metropolitan Line, one of the terminal stations. Good places to eat and shop a short walk from the station. Efficient Metropolitan Line service into central London (fast, semi-fast, and all station trains).

Terminus station for the Amersham branch of the London Underground Metropolitan Line. Underground services into London, and Chiltern line fast services southbound into London and northbound to Aylesbury.

Staff is sound me mate got his tenner chewed up in de ticket machine an They got it back for him try ask de same in central London
No chance
